channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 06/10/2024 INC#0004

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0004; 12:30AM; 520 W 118th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3KGj8Qc" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3KGj8Qc</a>; #VermontVista; *Address Corrected*. In a well-coordinated offensive firefight, 52 LAFD Firefighters took just 29 minutes to extinguish heavy fire on the first floor of a 2,478 square foot combination one- and two-story home. As the intense flames were extinguished, firefighters discovered an adult female within the home in need of immediate medical care. She was transported by ambulance in undetermined condition to an area hospital. No other injuries were reported. The fire's cause is under active investigation. No additional details are currently available. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA46 RA64 RA65 RA864 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0004; 12:01AM; 460 W 118th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VApVBm" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VApVBm</a>; #VermontVista; PRELIM: Fire showing from the first floor of a two-story home.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E266 E33 E46 E57 E64 E65 RA264 RA65 RA864 T33 T64 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1754; 11:09PM; 15460 W Roxford St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3x1gKRc" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3x1gKRc</a>; #Sylmar; 42 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to extinguish heavy fire, confining flames within the unoccupied one-story detached 2-car garage at the rear of the residential property, that had been converted to living quarters. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E18 E275 E287 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Train vs. Pedestrian Fatality; INC#1644; 09:29PM; Railroad Tracks East of 7600 Woodman Ave; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/awGYME9wbQmtbEmS7" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/awGYME9wbQmtbEmS7</a>; #VanNuys; PRELIM: Two adult pedestrians (one male, one female, approximately 35 years of age) deceased at scene after being struck by southbound Amtrak Pacific Surfliner Train #794. The train remains at scene. No other injuries reported. None of the 119 passengers or crew aboard the intercity passenger train require medical assistance. Media Inquiries: Amtrak, LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #4115) and Medical Examiner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E289 E39 E89 E98 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA89 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0895; 02:07PM; 3662 N Barham Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3VfKS3d" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3VfKS3d</a>; #HollywoodHills; Fist arriving 22 LAFD Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a kitchen fire within one second floor apartment at a large three-story center hallway apartment building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E229 E260 E60 E76 E86 RA76 RA86 T29 T60; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0112; 01:48AM; 1765 N Vista Del Mar Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2</a>; #Hollywood; 32 Firefighters took just 19 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a small abandoned and vacant two-story apartment building, that was well involved with fire on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E41 E447 RA82 RA827 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0112; 01:29AM; 1765 N Vista Del Mar Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yLEFV2</a>; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Small abandoned two-story apartment building well involved with fire. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 BC5 E227 E235 E27 E41 E447 RA82 RA827 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Railcar Fire; INC#0030; 01:20AM; 5222 E Valley Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4aT1O5h</a>; #ElSereno; 32 LAFD Firefighters took 54 minutes to secure the Union Pacific freight train and adjacent active railroad tracks, access, confine and fully extinguish burning contents within two adjacent (upper and lower) intermodal cargo containers in a double-stack configuration. The contents of both cars are ordinary combustibles, identified as automotive parts, such as seating components. No injury. No structures threatened. No off-site hazard identified. Media Inquiries: Union Pacific Railroad. ; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 BC775 E1 E16 E201 E202 E47 RA47 RA801 T1 T2; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey
